document_data.name: Mist of Shadows
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mist of Shadows''' was an elite [[elf|elven]] band of [[ranger]]s that roamed the great forest of [[Cormanthor]] sometime before the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The Mist of Shadows was active before the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, protecting the ancestral forest from outlaws and dangerous monsters. The group's second in command was [[Indeera Lakhan]] who wore a set of magic [[armor]], later named in her honor.
